Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Interface View

All Known Implementing Classes:
Cli, Gui
public interface View
this interface represent the gui, with the methods that have to be used for manage it

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    ThinModel getModel()
    this method get the thin model associated with the game
    void quit()
    this method is used to quit the game after
    default void showCli()
    this method is used only in the cli version of the gui, it print all the game state.in particular, it is used after some changes
    void showCompleteGame()
    this method show the game after that every player complete the initialization phase
    void showContextAction​(Status message)
    this method show the action associated with a specific state of the game, as a suggestion or an error message
    void showErrorMessage​(java.lang.Exception e)
    this method show the error message whenever is present
    void showInitialisingPhase​(java.util.List<LeaderCard> leaderCards, int position)
    this method is used to show the initialising phase.
    void showWinner​(java.lang.String winner, int victoryPoints)
    this method show the winner of the game.
    void updateTurn​(java.lang.String ownerTurnNickname)
    this method is used to change the turn, after that a player finish it.

  • Method Details

    • showContextAction

      void showContextAction​(Status message)
      this method show the action associated with a specific state of the game, as a suggestion or an error message
      Parameters:
      message - this is the message to show

    • showCli

      default void showCli()
      this method is used only in the cli version of the gui, it print all the game state.in particular, it is used after some changes

    • showErrorMessage

      void showErrorMessage​(java.lang.Exception e)
      this method show the error message whenever is present
      Parameters:
      e - this is the exception trowed

    • showInitialisingPhase

      void showInitialisingPhase​(java.util.List<LeaderCard> leaderCards, int position)
      this method is used to show the initialising phase. in particular, after that every player do the login, he have to select the leader cards and the initial resources
      Parameters:
      leaderCards - these are the initial leader cards
      position - this is the position of the player, used to manage the choice of the resources

    • showCompleteGame

      void showCompleteGame()
      this method show the game after that every player complete the initialization phase

    • quit

      void quit()
      this method is used to quit the game after

    • updateTurn

      void updateTurn​(java.lang.String ownerTurnNickname)
      this method is used to change the turn, after that a player finish it. in particular, if is the turn of the player specified by the nickname, the view will notify the player, do nothing otherwise (or eventually show the nickname of the player that own the turn)
      Parameters:
      ownerTurnNickname - this is the nickname of the player that now own the turn

    • showWinner

      void showWinner​(java.lang.String winner, int victoryPoints)
      this method show the winner of the game.
      Parameters:
      winner - this is the nickname of the winner
      victoryPoints - these are the victory points of the winner

    • getModel

      ThinModel getModel()
      this method get the thin model associated with the game
      Returns:
      the thin model associated with the game
